Room.Name: Hafnia Mountain Road/Phexton Road
Room.ShortDescription: This is a Y intersection between Hafnia Mountain Road and Phexton Road.
Room.LongDescription: Phexton Road continues to the north while Hafnia Mountain Road heads east and southwest. In the distance to to the southwest you can see Phexton Bridge. The elven city of Hafnia is still a long way to the east. Phexton is a small mountain community north of here. An old watch tower stands silent guard nearby.
